desc: The Perfect Sleep Chair will cradle you in comfort and lift you to your feet. Find out how our customers are changing their lives and their sleep habits.

layout.text: Get effortless comfort at the touch of a button.

From its infinite selection of positions – including completely flat – to its therapeutic heat and massage, the Perfect Sleep Chair has been thoughtfully designed to give you a personalized sleep experience. Sleep better so you can feel ready for a new day. Because enjoying life never gets old.
